sentences.en: A missile hit the ship and sank it.
sentences.cn: 导弹击中了那艘船,使其沉没了.

sentences.en: According to the air force, the missile merely impacted with the ground prematurely.
sentences.cn: 根据空军提供的消息，导弹只是提前撞向了地面。

sentences.en: China regrets the abrogation of the Anti - Ballistic Missile Treaty.
sentences.cn: 中国对《 反 弹道导弹条约》失效感到遗憾.

sentences.en: It was established that the missile had landed on a test range in Australia.
sentences.cn: 经证实，那枚导弹已经落在澳大利亚的试验区域内。

sentences.en: Missile deployment did much to further polarize opinion in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国，导弹部署极大地导致了意见进一步分化。

sentences.en: The guidance systems didn't work and the missile couldn't hit its target.
sentences.cn: 导航系统失灵，导弹未能命中目标。

sentences.en: The missile buried itself deep in the grassy hillside.
sentences.cn: 导弹深深地埋在杂草丛生的山坡上。

sentences.en: The missile curved gracefully towards its target.
sentences.cn: 导弹呈优美的曲线状飞向目标.

sentences.en: The plane was shot down in error by a NATO missile.
sentences.cn: 一枚北约的导弹误将那架飞机击落。

sentences.en: The sensitive clergyman shrank, with nervous dread, from the light missile.
sentences.cn: 那敏感的牧师怀着神经质的恐惧, 将身子一缩, 躲开了那轻飘的飞弹.

sentences.en: The smallest deflection of the missile could bring disaster.
sentences.cn: 导弹有极微小的偏斜也可能酿出大祸.

sentences.en: Their missile silos are below ground.
sentences.cn: 他们的导弹发射井在地下.

sentences.en: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.cn: 飞鱼导弹是他们最有攻击力的武器。

sentences.en: They claimed to have shot down one incoming missile.
sentences.cn: 他们声称击落了一枚来犯的导弹。

sentences.en: We got a fix on the missile launching site.
sentences.cn: 我们确定了导弹发射场的位置.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 弹道飞弹，弹道导弹
导弹；导向飞弹；有线导引飞弹
洲际弹道导弹；洲际导弹
远程导弹；洲际弹道导弹
导弹发射器；火箭发射装置
带核弹头导弹；战术核导弹

trans.tran_cn: 导弹的；可投掷的；用以发射导弹的

trans.tran_en: a weapon that can fly over long distances and that explodes when it hits the thing it has been aimed at
